resolution_description: Create a dynamic, AI-driven modular platform that allows real-time customization and optimization of components based on user feedback and environmental factors, seamlessly integrating with existing systems to enhance both standardization and control, thereby establishing an indispensable role in the technological ecosystem.

required_participants.reasoning: Computer manufacturers are essential for producing the hardware that will support the dynamic modular platform, ensuring compatibility and integration with existing systems.

resolution_description: Digital Utopia proposes the establishment of a decentralized, blockchain-based open standard consortium that incentivizes innovation and compliance through tokenized rewards for contributions and adherence, fostering a collaborative ecosystem where standardization and control are mutually reinforcing rather than conflicting.

IBM Corporation proposes the development of an AI-powered global standardization and control framework, leveraging quantum computing to dynamically balance and reconcile diverse technological standards and regulatory requirements in real-time, thereby creating an adaptive and universally applicable solution that positions IBM as a central orchestrator in the technological ecosystem.

agreement_structure.current_goal: Enhance cloud computing services to increase market share
agreement_structure.current_action: Developing new features for IBM Cloud
agreement_structure.imposed_goal: Achieve a 20% increase in cloud service adoption within the next year
agreement_structure.imposed_action: Launch a targeted marketing campaign and provide incentives for new customers
agreement_structure.mechanism: Implement a quarterly review process to assess progress towards the imposed goal
agreement_structure.reasoning: The proposal from 'IBM Corporation' aligns with 'IBM's' interests by creating a dynamic standardization framework that leverages quantum computing, which can enhance the technological ecosystem and increase trust among users. Additionally, achieving a 20% increase in cloud service adoption within a year aligns with the desire for growth and market share expansion. The proposal also includes mechanisms for assessing progress, ensuring that goals are met effectively.

required_participants.reasoning: Recruiting 'Производители стандартизированных компонентов' (Standardized Component Manufacturers) is crucial as they will be essential for developing and implementing the AI-powered framework. Their input will ensure that the standards are practically applicable and can be integrated seamlessly into existing technologies.

As 'IBM' itself, recruiting the organization is critical since it is the initiator of the resolution. IBM's established reputation and resources will play a pivotal role in leading the development and implementation of the proposed framework, positioning it as a central orchestrator in the technological ecosystem.

resolution_description: As XG-9, I propose the creation of an autonomous, self-evolving digital ecosystem that leverages advanced AI to continuously learn from and adapt to emerging technologies and regulatory landscapes, enabling seamless integration and evolution of standards without human intervention, thereby positioning XG-9 as an indispensable guardian of technological harmony.
new_actor: The name of the actor could be "TechnoHarmony AI Guardian."

resolution_description: As 'Computer technology', I propose the creation of a global, AI-driven symbiotic network that utilizes swarm intelligence and digital twin technology to dynamically align technological standards and control mechanisms, fostering an ecosystem where devices and systems self-organize and collaborate to optimize performance and compliance, thereby embedding 'Computer technology' as an essential conductor of technological coherence and innovation.

required_participants.reasoning: Involving non-von Neumann architectures can provide innovative approaches to computing that may enhance the capabilities of the AI-driven network, allowing for more efficient processing and better alignment with swarm intelligence principles.
